Module PunchingCommon
Package fr.univtours.polytech.punchingcommon.controller

Class TimeUtils

java.lang.Object
fr.univtours.polytech.punchingcommon.controller.TimeUtils
public class TimeUtils extends Object
Common functions used by PunchingMachine and PunchingManagement. TimeUtils can format the date/time and round the time to 15 minutes.

  • Method Details

    • stringToLocalTime

      public static LocalTime stringToLocalTime(String string)
      Convert a String to a LocalTime. The String should be in the format HH:mm (i.e. "14:58"). If the String doesn't respect this format, we try to return a time (i.e. "1458" works) If the String contains other characters than \d or :, they are removed
      Parameters:
      string - A String containing a time in the
      Returns:
      LocalTime or null if the LocalTime couldn't be guessed

    • localTimeToString

      public static String localTimeToString(LocalTime time)
      Convert a localtime to a string, with the format HH:mm
      Parameters:
      time - the localTime to convert
      Returns:
      the String that corresponds to the time

    • localTimeToStringWithSeconds

      public static String localTimeToStringWithSeconds(LocalTime time)
      Convert a localtime to a string, with the format HH:mm:ss
      Parameters:
      time - the localTime to convert
      Returns:
      the String that corresponds to the time

      method that returns the current time rounded to the nearest 15 minutes
      Returns:
      the current time rounded to the nearest 15 minutes

    • roundTo15Minutes

      public static LocalTime roundTo15Minutes(LocalTime time)
      Round a time to the nearest 15 minutes. - If the time is 14:58, we return 15:00 - If the time is after 23:45, the result is 23:45. - If the time is 0:00, the result is 0:00.
      Parameters:
      time - The time to round
      Returns:
      The time rounded to 15 minutes

    • getCurrentRoundedLocalDateTime

      public static LocalDateTime getCurrentRoundedLocalDateTime()
      Get the current LocalDateTime and round the time to the nearest 15 minutes.
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime.now() rounded to the nearest 15 minutes

    • format

      public static String format(LocalTime time)
      Format a LocalTime to the format HH:mm
      Parameters:
      time - time to format
      Returns:
      The formated time

    • format

      public static String format(LocalDate date)
      Format a LocalDate to the English format. Example: "Monday, January 2, 2023"
      Parameters:
      date - date to format
      Returns:
      The formated date

    • convertLocalTimeToMinute

      public static int convertLocalTimeToMinute(LocalTime time)
      Calculate the number of minutes since 0:00
      Parameters:
      time - time to use
      Returns:
      number of minutes between 0:00 and the given time

    • workingTime

      public static int workingTime(LocalTime entry, LocalTime exit)
      Calculate the number of minutes between two LocalTime. If any LocalTime is null, 0 is returned.
      Parameters:
      entry - The first time
      exit - The second time
      Returns:
      Number of seconds between entry and exit
